channel.title: Need help! >.< [PI]
channel.description: Hello, im making a server and i need help to make a teleport panel, or a npc much like mr ex that teleports you around the server, Ive been trying to fix it for awhile but i cant get it to work, i am willing to pay money depending on how much msg me on skype my username is kazkax, Thank you.

item.title: Need help! >.< [PI]
item.dc:creator: @magez12345 magez12345
item.description:
@magez12345 wrote:

Thanks, really appreciate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! >.< [PI]
item.dc:creator: @magez12345 magez12345
item.description:
@magez12345 wrote:

Its a 317 pi and i think i used acheron base, i am also having trouble with npcs facing the right way ive used lots of tutorials but none of them seem to work so i found a server with the correct code to make them face the right way, i compiled and got no errors i edited them to make them face the right way in spawn config but still they only face 1 direction. if you could help with this too id be grateful

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! >.< [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

magez12345:

Hello, im making a server and i need help to make a teleport panel, or a npc much like mr ex that teleports you around the server, Ive been trying to fix it for awhile but i cant get it to work, i am willing to pay money depending on how much msg me on skype my username is kazkax, Thank you.

Can you give us more information about the server? Base? Revision?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! >.< [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Combatx Combatx
item.description:
@Combatx wrote:

you know you can just simply do it your self, just copy the interface management for where it displays like the dialog for mrex.java and make a new one do the same imports and use go to the same place where the imports are just copy and change the npc id and make sure you change the cords of the teleporting while doing this you can also change the animation of teleporting. .

Read full topic
